name: Concrete Vessels: Capsule Vase 1
description:
MU Concrete Vessels are architecture-inspired forms cast in industrial strength concrete.

Capsule Vase is hand cast in concrete, molded from an original model by Janny Baek. Vases hold one 20mm pyrex glass tube (included). Concrete exterior is lightly polished and sealed with beeswax.

height: 8" 
weight: approx. 4 lbs

Not intended for outdoor use. Heavy. Concrete.

Note: Because Concrete Vessels are hand cast in small batches, there may be slight variations in color and surface markings. All MU Concrete items are intended for indoor use only- we can't guarantee the performance of the surface finish in the outdoors.

A limited number of Capsule Vase in Light, Medium, and Dark is now available.

Shipping in the US only.

name: Concrete Forms: StarFruit Orange
description:
MU Concrete Forms are decorative design objects inspired by science and nature.

Starfruit is hand cast in concrete, molded from an original sculpture by Janny Baek. Lightly polished and sealed with beeswax, finished with touches of high gloss enamel paint. 

height: 5" 
weight: approx. 1.5 lbs

Not intended for outdoor use. Heavy. Not a toy.

Note: Because Concrete Starfruit is hand cast in small batches, there may be slight variations in the color and surface of the figure. All MU Concrete items are intended for indoor use only- we can't guarantee the performance of the surface finish in the outdoors.

A limited number of Starfruit Concrete in Orange is now available.

Shipping in the US only.

name: Concrete Figures: Space Girl in Pink or Blue Helmet
description:
MU Concrete Figures are modern-day guardian statues. The characters of The MU meet industrial-strength materials.

Space Girl is hand cast in concrete, molded from an original sculpture by Janny Baek. Lightly polished and sealed with beeswax, finished with touches of high gloss enamel paint. 

height: 10" 
weight: approx. 6 lbs

Not intended for outdoor use. Heavy. Not a toy.

Note: Because Concrete Space Girl is hand cast in small batches, there may be slight variations in the color and surface of the figure. All MU Concrete items are intended for indoor use only- we can't guarantee the performance of the surface finish in the outdoors.

A limited number of Space Girl in Blue is now available.

Shipping in the US only.

height: 9"
weight: approx. 6 lbs

name: Postcards from the Insect World A-Z
description:
Story - Science - Letter cards from the Microcosmic Universe. Leap with grasshoppers, fly with the fireflies, and follow along with our miniature adventurers as they explore the Insect World from A-Z.

Read the cards in alphabetical order to learn fascinating facts about insects both familiar and strange. Or, arrange the cards chronologically by postmark date to follow the story of travelling explorers writing to each other about their discoveries! Recommended for ages 3+.

Product dimensions: 
approx. 6" x 4" x 2", weight approx 1.2 lbs.

Made in NYC. Thick, sturdy cards with rounded corners, high quality semi-gloss printing with soy based ink. Designed and written by Janny Baek and Thomas McMahon.

Please allow 3-4 business days for shipping. Shipping in the US only.

options.name: Postcards from the Insect World with gift wrap and gift receipt

name: Magnetic Comic Strip Kit- Original Series
description:
Create your own comic strip on any magnet-receptive surface with over 20 cool magnets from the world of the MU! Blank magnetic write on/wipe off speech balloons and background panels let you dream up and create your own comic strip scenarios. Use on your fridge, dishwasher, radiator, or any metal or magnet-receptive surface!

Includes over 20 flexible magnets from the world of the MU, 4 blank write on/wipe off background panels, 2 reusable write on/wipe off speech balloons, and dry erase marker (only intended for use on write on/wipe off surfaces).

MADE IN USA: FSC-certified recycled packaging, printed with soy-based water soluble inks, biodegradable plastic marker.

Recommended for ages 5+.

Product dimensions: 
approx. 8" x 6.5" x 1.5", weight approx 1.4 lbs.

Designed by Janny Baek and Thomas McMahon.

Please allow 3-4 business days for shipping. Shipping in the US only.

options.name: Magnetic Comic Strip Kit- Original with gift receipt and gift wrap

name: Story Board Print - Greedy Ants
description:
The Story Board Prints depict the quirky adventures that befall our favorite intrepid mini-explorers as they venture into the depths of the Microcosmic Universe. In Greedy Ants, two miniature explorers go in search of their missing batch of animal crackers, their primary source of food. Limited edition prints are hand-numbered and printed on 100% recycled heavyweight semi-gloss stock, 18" x 24". Please allow 3-4 business days for shipping. Sorry, shipping in the US only!

$5 Flat rate shipping on all orders!

name: Story Board Print - The Early Bird
description:
The Story Board Prints depict the quirky adventures that befall our favorite intrepid mini-explorers as they venture into the depths of the Microcosmic Universe. In The Early Bird, a skeptical test pilot discusses the qualities of a newly built mechanical bird rocket. Limited edition prints are hand-numbered and printed on 100% recycled heavyweight semi-gloss stock, 18" x 24". Please allow 3-4 business days for shipping. Sorry, shipping in the US only!

$5 Flat rate shipping on all orders!
